title: No more promos please
body: Riot, please just give me the oppurtunity to skip these 10 placement matches and just be bronze 5. These matches give me too much hope and then being let down. I beg of you.

replies.body: Absolutely.  There is ZERO point to placement games.  Doesn't matter what score you get, you still go down a level....  Actually better to start a new account than play the one you've been on for 4 years.
lol, I feel the same, I am bronze 5 and will be bronze 5 may as well as be in bronze 5
